abstract: Two recent academic papers show that in certain circumstances, advertisers on Facebook may be able to learn sensitive profile information, like a person’s sexual orientation or religion.
snippet: Two recent academic papers show that in certain circumstances, advertisers on Facebook may be able to learn sensitive profile information, like a person’s sexual orientation or religion.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Online advertising offers marketers the chance to aim ads at very specific groups of people  say, golf players in Illinois who make more than $150,000 a year and vacation in Hawaii.

headline.main: Marketers Can Glean Private Data on Facebook
headline.print_headline: Marketers Can Glean Private Data On Facebook
